attributes.action: Mental Health disabilites should be treated like a physical disability (PIP)
attributes.additional_details:
the last few years mental health has started to be recognised as an illness, still a taboo subject
Mental health Is a disability, it affects your ability to socialise,shop, be independent  everything like being in a wheelchair does. 
Just because you can’t see doesn’t mean we’re not disabled. 
Pip is for people with disability so stop discriminating and being predujice 
In Scotland and Wales people with severe mental health are entitled to a blue badge & PiP
MH Services are suffering, so are we
attributes.background:
PiP is discriminating mental health disabilities 
Having mental health can be just as disabling as a physical disability.
mental health disabilities you can’t see the daily struggles and pain but because we don’t have physical ailments we are passed of with having no disabilities, even when we do

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about support for people with mental health disabilities, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
